value.title: Corporations Are Hoping Computer Vision Cams Will Limit Their Coronavirus Liability
value.excerpt: Aside from figuring out when to end their shutdowns as quickly as possible, one of the main concerns on the minds of large and small businesses is how they can avoid litigation once they do reopen. And it turns out that these business’s mission to avoid getting the pants sued off of them might inadvertently end up stomping on the personal privacy of the consumers they’re so eager to bleed dry.

value.title: Paige raises $5 million more from Goldman Sachs to detect cancer with computer vision
value.excerpt: Health care startup Paige has raised an additional $5 million to help diagnose cancer using computer vision trained with clinical imaging data. The idea is to use data sets related to treatment and genomics to train the company’s deep learning networks to detect breast, prostate, and other major cancers.
